channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
well, i have a question about limewire lol i dunno if this is the right place to put this, but oh well. anyways iv been using limewire for a while, and its been working perfect, BUT then like 3 days ago it just stoped , it loads and all , but when you click a song, it wont play, its like i didnt even click it :(
HELP PLEASE!!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @nickk nickk
item.description:
@nickk wrote:

oh , thanks man, but i just moved all the songs from limewire to wmpâ€¦
it works perfect, and thanks for the advice

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well, some suggestions:

Make sure windows media player is installed(or whatever music playing program you prefer). Use google, or navigate your way through the microsoft website to find windows media player. Then try reinstalling limewire, a file could have gotten corrup somehow, it happens.

Read full topic
